name: My Resume
tagline: Some HTML, css, js and PHP projects I have worked on and contributed to.
body:
## Welcome to my GitHub Page.

### Thank you for visiting my page.

This page shows some of the most significant projects (the ones I can publicly share with you) I have participated on.

### What will you find here? 

* https://github.com/mikerai/Resume/tree/master/F6-resume-02-2016. My current resume code that can be visited on http://mikerai.com
* https://github.com/mikerai/Resume/tree/master/rodiles-blur-2015. This is the code corresponding to the http://rodiles.com.mx website 
* https://github.com/mikerai/Resume/tree/master/violetaestudio_2015-5.5.2. Set of code used to create http://violetaestudio.com
* https://github.com/mikerai/Resume/tree/master/sara_junio_16. All the code needed to create this beautiful and minimalistic resume: http://muino.net

### Authors and Contributors

Special mention goes to @brito. He has helped me, taught me and collaborated with me providing insights, ideas and direction to most of my projects enlisted here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
